# UISceneClassName

**Property List Key**

The name of the scene class you want UIKit to instantiate.

## Discussion

Specify [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIWindowScene] for scenes meant for your app or an external display. Don’t specify [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIScene].

## Scene objects

- **UISceneDelegateClassName**: The name of the app-specific class that you want UIKit to instantiate and use as the scene delegate object.
